text: If you enjoyed this story, please click the 👏 button and share to help others find it! Feel free to leave a comment below.
translation: 如果您喜欢这个故事，请单击👏按钮并分享以帮助其他人找到它！ 随时在下面发表评论。

text: This story is published in The Startup, Medium’s largest entrepreneurship publication followed by +406,714 people.
translation: 这个故事在中型企业最大的创业刊物《 The Startup》中发表，紧随其后的是+406,714人。

text: Subscribe to receive our top stories here.
translation: 订阅此处即可接收我们的热门新闻。

text: The First
translation: 首先

text: is active income. This is your full-time salaried or part-time hourly job. It also umbrellas side hustles like freelance work, Uber driving, Fiverr gigs, etc. It is the process of trading your time for money.
translation: 是活跃收入。 这是您的全职受薪或兼职每小时工作。 它还掩盖了自由职业，Uber驾驶，Fiverr演出等方面的麻烦。这是用金钱换钱的过程。

text: The Second
translation: 第二

text: is passive income. These are earnings that may not require as much hands on work, including investing, real estate, e-commerce, royalties, etc. This allows you to have some financial flexibility outside of your 9–5, without having to necessarily be present to reap the benefits.
translation: 是被动收入。 这些收入可能不需要太多的工作，包括投资，房地产，电子商务，特许权使用费等。这使您可以在9-5的基础上拥有一定的财务灵活性，而不必一定要出席 好处。

text: The Secret To Financial Success Is..
translation: 财务成功的秘诀是..

text: understanding how to build up multiple revenue streams combining both active and passive income.
translation: 了解如何建立结合主动和被动收入的多种收入来源。

text: A lot of people settle on their career salary, or sit on it for a decade before making a move. If your ambition is to be average, then that mindset is fine. But to be in the top tier of wealth, you need to start figuring out different ways to make money simultaneously.
translation: 很多人都选择职业薪资，或者在搬家之前坐了十年。 如果您的野心是平均水平，那么这种心态很好。 但是要成为财富的最高层，您需要开始寻找同时赚钱的不同方法。

caption: Photo by Sharon McCutcheon on Unsplash

text: Right now I am operating on 4 income streams:
translation: 现在，我在4种收入来源上运营：

text: By the end of 2020 I hope to have added at least 4 of the following to that list:
translation: 我希望到2020年底，该列表中至少添加以下4种：

text: On their own, these income sources are good, but rather modest. When combined, they elevate me to a different level of success.
translation: 这些收入来源本身是好的，但是比较适中。 当结合在一起时，它们将我提升到另一个不同的成功水平。

text: Ashton Kutcher is a great example. You may know him as the famous film/television star. He’s had a respectable career and made a lot of money. But even if he never received another movie role again, Kutcher would still be wealthier than 99% of the world due to his diversified portfolio of revenue streams. Since the early 2000’s he’s owned a production company, invested in tech startups, and formed a venture capital firm.
translation: 阿什顿·库彻（Ashton Kutcher）是一个很好的例子。 您可能知道他是著名的电影/电视明星。 他的职业生涯很受人尊敬，赚了很多钱。 但是，即使他再也没有担任过其他电影角色，由于他多样化的收入来源组合，库彻仍将比全球99％的富裕。 自2000年初以来，他拥有一家生产公司，投资于科技创业公司，并成立了一家风险投资公司。

text: Wealth is more than money. It is a series of learned strategies and behaviors.
translation: 财富不仅仅是金钱。 这是一系列学习到的策略和行为。

text: “If we command our wealth, we shall be free; if our wealth commands us, we are poor indeed”- Edmund Burke
translation: “如果我们掌握财富，我们将获得自由； 如果我们的财富支配着我们，那我们确实是穷人”-Edmund Burke

caption: Photo by Fabrizio Conti on Unsplash

text: In Conclusion
translation: 结论

text: This process won’t happen overnight. I’m sure most people reading this don’t have more than a few income streams yet.
translation: 这个过程不会在一夜之间发生。 我敢肯定，大多数阅读此书的人收入来源还不多。

text: If you do, fantastic. You’re already on the path to a wealthier future.
translation: 如果可以，那就太好了。 您已经在走向更富裕的未来。

text: If not, don’t panic.
translation: 如果没有，不要惊慌。

text: Even if you only have one that’s fine. Your goal should be to get the ball rolling on researching the opportunities that exist out there to make more money.
translation: 即使您只有一个也没关系。 您的目标应该是研究存在的赚更多钱的机会。

text: Start with something easy like investing a small percentage of your paycheck. Over time you can build out different income streams until your side earnings are matching your salary. Then push for more.
translation: 首先从简单的事情开始，例如将您的薪水的一小部分投资。 随着时间的流逝，您可以建立不同的收入来源，直到您的边际收入与您的工资相匹配。 然后推动更多。

caption: Photo by Almos Bechtold on Unsplash

text: If You Want To Be Rich, Stop Focusing On Your Salary (Do This Instead)
translation: 如果您想致富，请停止关注薪水（改为这样做）

text: How do the rich get richer?
translation: 富人如何致富？

text: Over the past four months I’ve gained a newfound understanding of self-worth.
translation: 在过去的四个月中，我对自我价值有了新的认识。

text: I used to break down my money into two categories; salary and savings. The process was very simple. To make an income, I provided my time and skills in exchange for money. I would then keep a percentage of my bi-weekly paycheck for myself and put the rest of it into a savings account.
translation: 我曾经把钱分为两类： 工资和储蓄。 这个过程非常简单。 为了赚钱，我提供了时间和技能来换钱。 然后，我将自己的双周薪水的一部分留给自己，然后将其剩余部分存入储蓄帐户。

text: The truth is, that this is how you make good money. It’s not how you make great money.
translation: 事实是，这就是您赚钱的方式。 这不是您赚钱的方式。

text: In his New York Times bestseller The 4-Hour Workweek, Tim Ferris explains why being the second-lowest paid person at his company persuaded him to start BrainQUICKEN LLC on the side and slowly build it up. This venture turned his 40k per year into 40k per month.
translation: 蒂姆·费里斯（Tim Ferris）在他的《纽约时报》畅销书《四小时工作周》中解释了为什么成为自己公司中收入第二低的人说服他在一边创办BrainQUICKEN LLC并慢慢建立起来的原因。 这项投资使他每年的4万变成了每月4万。

text: Had Ferris stayed complacent with his single source of revenue, and focused all of his energy on climbing the corporate ladder, he never would have become the entrepreneurial icon we know today.
translation: 如果Ferris对自己的单一收入来源保持自满，并且将所有精力都集中在攀登公司阶梯上，那么他永远不会成为我们今天所知道的企业家偶像。

text: The key to making more starts with a higher level understanding of wealth, and the two different ways we define income.
translation: 赚更多钱的关键始于对财富的更高层次的理解，以及我们定义收入的两种不同方式。

caption: Photo by bruce mars on Unsplash

text: (本文翻译自Jonah Malin的文章《If You Want To Be Rich, Stop Focusing On Your Salary (Do This Instead)》，参考：https://medium.com/swlh/if-you-want-to-be-rich-stop-focusing-on-your-salary-do-this-instead-b7fcb0afc485)
translation: （本文翻译自乔纳·马林（Jonah Malin）的文章《如果你想致富，不要再集中精力在薪水上了（改为这样做）》，参考：https：//medium.com/swlh/if-you-want-to-be- 丰富停止专注于您的薪水而不是b7fcb0afc485）
